english.segment1: Come out in clothes you like. And tell me of all of the bands you fight. And if you look around. You stay up late when you fix all the sounds
english.segment2: Come out and pick a night. A night when you lose your life. Because I look around. I'll stay up late when you fix all the sounds
english.segment3: These are good times. Things like this help me. Through all of the long long nights. These are good times. Things like this help me
english.segment4: Come out in clothes you like. And tell me of all of the bands you fight. And if you look around. You stay up late when you fix all the sounds
english.segment5: These are good times. Things like this help me. Through all of the long long nights. These are good times. Things like this help me
